trans-unit.source: Provides a managed wrapper around a High Level Shading Language (HLSL) pixel shader.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un wrapper gestito intorno a un elevato livello sfondo Language () pixel shader HLSL.

trans-unit.source: Use the PixelShader class to access pre-compiled HLSL bytecode in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe PixelShader per accedere al bytecode precompilato HLSL in un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

trans-unit.source: You can create a PixelShader from a Pack URI reference or from a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un PixelShader da un riferimento URI di tipo Pack o da un <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource%2A> property or call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.SetStreamSource%2A> method to load the shader bytecode.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource%2A>proprietà o chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.SetStreamSource%2A>per caricare il bytecode dello shader.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.SetStreamSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a custom effect, assign the PixelShader to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect.PixelShader%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un effetto personalizzato, assegnare il PixelShader alla <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect.PixelShader%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect.PixelShader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando si copiano le proprietà di dipendenza di questo oggetto, questo metodo copia risorsa riferimenti e i data binding (che potrebbe non risolvere più), ma non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Clone può essere utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method to provide a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde ereditato <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>metodo per fornire un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile di questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Il clone restituito è effettivamente una copia completa dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The clone's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il clone <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiate, ma vengono copiati i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the render thread cannot process the pixel shader.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il thread di rendering non è in grado di elaborare il pixel shader.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <xref:System.IO.Stream> to use as the source of HLSL bytecode.
trans-unit.target: Assegna il <xref:System.IO.Stream>da utilizzare come origine del bytecode HLSL.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream to read the HLSL bytecode from.
trans-unit.target: Flusso da leggere il bytecode HLSL.

trans-unit.source: source is .
trans-unit.target: sourceis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use hardware or software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se utilizzare il rendering hardware o software.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> renders in hardware when there is a capable hardware accelerator; otherwise, it renders in software.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>esegue il rendering in hardware quando è presente un acceleratore che supporta hardware; in caso contrario, esegue il rendering software.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>

trans-unit.source: The ShaderRenderMode property alters this behavior, based on its value.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ShaderRenderMode modifica questo comportamento, in base al relativo valore.

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, and there is no capable hardware available, the entire <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, ed è presente alcun hardware adatto, l'intero <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>viene ignorato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> always renders using software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Se impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>Visualizza sempre il rendering software.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> has the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>il comportamento predefinito.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode"></xref> value that indicates whether to force the use of hardware or software rendering for the effect.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode"> </xref> valore che indica se forzare l'utilizzo di rendering hardware o software per l'effetto.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.ShaderRenderMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.ShaderRenderMode*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.ShaderRenderMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Pack URI reference to HLSL bytecode in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un riferimento URI di tipo Pack bytecode HLSL nell'assembly.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> is a Pack URI reference to a file inside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>è un riferimento URI di tipo Pack in un file all'interno dell'assembly.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The Pack URI reference to HLSL bytecode in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Riferimento URI di tipo Pack HLSL nell'assembly.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
